Translations.Text: aap keh dijiye ke wo Allah ta’ala ek (hee) hai
na us se koyi paida hoa, na wo kisi se paida hoa
aur na koyi us ka hamsar hai
aap keh dijiye! ke main subah ke rab ki panaah mein ata hoon
har us cheez ke shar se jo us ne paida ki hai
aur andheri raath ki taariki ke shar se, jab us ka andhera phayl jaaye
aur girah (laga kar un) mein phunkne waaliyo ke shar se (bhi)
aur hasad karne waale ki buraayi se bhi, jab wo hasadh kare
aap keh dijiye! ke main logo ke parvardigaar ki panaah mein ata hoon
was wasa daalne waale, piche hat jaane waale ke shar se
jo logo ke sino mein was wasa daalta hai
(qaah) wo jinn mein se ho ya insaan mein se
